When Kuvira threatened the city, Hiroshi was momentarily released from prison by Lin Beifong and helped to equip the prototypes of the hummingbird mecha suit with plasma saws. Hiroshi's commitment to protect Republic City renewed Asami's respect for her father and she forgave him his past deeds.
